comments.body: wait, so checking for the honeypots, taxes and all that happens automatically and cancels if it finds anything? Wow! This is interesting, finally I can make something on these shitcoins I guess

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: Quote from: Mark@Hodlers on August 25, 2023, 09:29:37 AMwait, so checking for the honeypots, taxes and all that happens automatically and cancels if it finds anything? Wow! This is interesting, finally I can make something on these shitcoins I guess ¬† Yes, it all happens automatically, you just set your price and our system does the rest. You will just need the contract, everything else is handled in auto-mode. Any delays, deadblocks, honeypots, delayed taxes, just high taxes, other hidden tricks etc. It will analyze everything in real-time and pick the right time when to buy for you, in fully anonymous mode. With speed that no sniper has. Also you in full control of buying price. You can set it up to buy at max +50% of initial launch price for example. If conditions is not right or launch is highly botted or pre-bought - our sniper will cancel tx gasless, even if it was already sent. Users not paying gas, fees or loosing anything. We also have a buying schedule so anyone can schedule as many launches as he want. Completely stress-free experience. ¬†We have a token on BSC already, launching on ETH on 26 August 20:00 UTC. More info here: https://revolution.def.cafe/You can join our super easy 1000$ Twitter repost giveaway as well, just repost this tweet and come up with a joke about our Alternative Sniping System (ASS). More here: https://t.me/defcafe_main/149931/150015Let us know if you have more questions!

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: Quote from: youwhaat on August 25, 2023, 04:00:51 PMwhat is the HC for the presale? this looks good¬† üí•ETH Presale details!üí•‚ùáÔ∏èHardcap/Softcap: 40 ETH / 30 ETHAround 26 ETH needed for 1:1 liquidity provision. Extra funds reserved for possible price fluctuations in BSC CAFE's price during the ETH presale stage. Any funds not used for liquidity will be applied to balance the price via price-balancer.‚ùáÔ∏èMaximum contribution: 0.5 ETH per whitelisted wallet. Whitelist spots will be distributed among PRO tier members and trusted communities.‚ùáÔ∏èToken Rate: 1:1 to BSC at launch on ETH. Means if you contribute 0.1 ETH, you will receive as many tokens as you would by buying 0.1 ETH on the BSC side at the moment of launch. Current rate: 8000 CAFE/0.1 ETH. The final amount will be fixed at the moment of launch.‚ùáÔ∏èTokens to be sold on Presale:¬† ~4-5.5 million, leaving ~4.5-6 million to be excluded from the total supply of 10m for staking rewards, thereby increasing the revenue share. Any excessive tokens will be deducted from calculating of staking rewards and used to provide initial liquidity to bridge0, for the price balancer and for possible CEX listings.‚ùáÔ∏èWhen and Where: 26th August, On https://revolution.def.cafe/ website. 20:00 UTC

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: ‚ùóÔ∏èSTAKING MIGRATION! üí∞ Our staking has successfully migrated! Please visit our staking page at http://stake.def.cafe and follow the straightforward steps provided.‚ó¶ From now on, staking rewards will be paid in their respective native BNB and ETH currencies on each chain. You can stake, unstake, and claim rewards. Remember to switch chains in your wallet accordingly after ETH launch. ‚ó¶ For those who wish to import their staked wallet into FTT and manage staking without switching chains, FTT will soon offer this feature in upcoming updates.‚ó¶ The first batch of rewards was converted to BNB and has already been automatically distributed to everyone's staking wallets. At present, there's no immediate action required on your part, other than re-staking. ‚ó¶ It's worth noting that the rewards displayed in the calculator represent projections for 2-3 months of growth. Rest assured, we are on track to meet this projection!üì¢ Stay tuned for next updates!

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: Please take a moment to familiarize yourself with the BRIDGE0 interface and its main functionality.üí†BRIDGE0 will be available at the moment of launch (today 20:00 UTC).üíéWhat is bridging?In simple terms, bridging is the conversion of your $CAFE tokens from BSC to ETH (to other way around). The number of tokens remains exactly the same; only the symbol after the number changes.üíéHow can you benefit from that?Let's say that $CAFE on ETH is now more expensive than on BSC. In order to profit from this, you buy 10 $CAFE on BSC and bridge them to ETH. Your 10 $CAFE are now on ETH. The number of your tokens remains the same, but the price is different (since $CAFE on ETH is more expensive). Now, you can sell $CAFE on ETH and secure your profit! Such an action is called arbitrage.üíéBRIDGE0, our near-instant and cost-free bridge, provides users with the best arbitrage opportunities possible.Please read more about price balancing features, whale protection (as shown in the screenshots, the larger the amount of funds, the more time required) and other Bridge0 features here.If (https://docs.def.cafe/what-we-do/bridge0/#topnav) you are still have questions (or don't want to read) we are happy to answer here in TG @defcafe_supportbot

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: ETH CAFE is launched and Bridge0 is up and running!The ASS Release drops tomorrow. Giveaway results will be tomorrow, too. Stay tuned for that!Thanks for being part of this journey with us. Here's to more updates and gains-generating features ahead!

comments.author: Def.Cafe
comments.body: We had planned to deliver ASS to you as soon as possible. However, there are a few areas we need to address further to ensure the best experience, and streamline update process for existing FTT users. Therefore, we've decided to postpone the ASS release. This will give us the necessary time to implement the requested features for managing your entries and exits. It ensures we can conduct vital backend migrations with the high-quality standards you've come to expect from Def.Cafe.ASS FINAL Release Schedule:On 9th September (Saturday), FTT will undergo a 6-hour maintenance period as we transition to a new, more high-throughput server cluster. Once the migration is complete, we'll be opening ASS to a existing group of closed testers.On 11th September (Monday), ASS will be released to the public use.As our gratitude for your patience, anyone with a registered account on FTT and at least one trade will be able to use üí•ASS completely FREEüí• for the entire week following its release.Thank you for your continued support! The wait will be worth it!
